category: Regulations/Supplementary Provisions on Establishment and Operation of Advisory Committee
contents: *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2016.03.21. Article 1 (Enforcement Date) This regulation shall be enforced from the date the Korea Sports Council completes registration of establishment, and shall be reported to the first board of directors. Article 2 (Exception to term of office) Notwithstanding Article 6 of this regulation, Articles of Incorporation *Supplementary Provisions Article 2 The newly elected president pursuant to Article may form a new committee pursuant to Article 2 of these regulations immediately after the start of his/her term of office. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2017.04.03. This regulation shall be effective from the date of approval by the Board of Directors, but members appointed by the President of the Korea Sports Council who took office on October 6, 2016 shall be deemed to have been appointed in accordance with this regulation. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2018.04.25. This regulation comes into effect from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2018.07.09. This regulation comes into effect from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2019.01.31. This regulation comes into effect from the date when the Articles of Incorporation, which are revised and approved at the 2019 Annual General Meeting after resolution by the Board of Directors, go into effect. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2020.02.11. This regulation comes into effect from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2023.07.05. Article 1 (Enforcement Date) This regulation shall enter into force from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. Article 2 (Special Provisions) Notwithstanding Article 6 (1) of this regulation, a new regulation is established in accordance with Articles 19 and 25 to 33. The first term of office for the committee members will be until the day before the 2025 regular general meeting.
